pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 15, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Paris, France

10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Paris, France.

Paris – Le Bourget Airport
180, esplanade de l'Air et de l'Espace

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Notre-Dame de Paris Cathedral.

Notre-Dame de Paris Cathedral
6, place du Parvis Notre-Dame

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at the Palais de l’Élysée.

Palais de l’Élysée
55, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

4:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Christchurch Call to Action event.

Palais de l’Élysée
55, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the King of Jordan, Abdullah II bin Al-Hussein.

Le Bristol Paris
112, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Norway, Erna Solberg.

Canadian Official Residence
135, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Tech for Good Summit dinner.

Palais de l’Élysée
55, rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of the Prime Minister’s arrival
